text: (Boz ham, ta'kid menamojad:) Ore, ʙa zudī xohand donist! (In ta'kid ʙaroi rost va haqiqat ʙudani pajomʙarii Rasuli Alloh sallallohu alajhi va sallam dalolat menamojad va on ci ki ū, az Qur'on va az rūzi zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidan ovardaast.) (Dar in ojat va'id va tahdide ast ʙaroi ahli kuffor)
